source: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_SKYWATCHER_000_000<tab>Not that it isn't always wise to keep an eye on the skies, but in the Diadem it could be the difference between life and death, considering how it affects the behavior of beasts. source: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_000_030<tab>Some of Eureka's—rather vicious, I must say—fauna are active only in certain climatic conditions, so I do hope the adventuring contingent will take a healthy interest in my reports.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_000_030<tab>Vous voulez écouter mon bulletin météo<var 1D /var>? Hé hé, on reconnaît l'attention au détail typique des aventuriers chevronnés<var 1D /var>! Comme vous l'avez sûrement pressenti, certaines espèces indigènes d'Eurêka ne sortent de leur tanière que quand des conditions météorologiques précises sont réunies.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFWEATHERFORECASTINTERRITORY_00310_EUWATCHER_100_030<tab>However, if you are hoping to glean some knowledge on the phenomenon of umbral turbulence, I am afraid you will be left wanting. It is a rather fickle atmospheric condition whose mysteries yet elude us.

Restez sur vos gardes<var 1D /var>!
